text: Angelo Carossino (21 February 1929 â€“ 28 July 2020) was an Italian politician. He was President of Liguria between 1975 to 1979. He was a MEP from 1979 to 1989. Before, he was Mayor of Savona between 1958 to 1967. Carossino died on 28 July 2020, aged 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:MEPs for Italy Category:Italian mayors Category:People from Savona Category:Politicians from Liguria
title: Angelo Carossino
